engine

Class Minion

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.Card
      • engine.Minion

  • class Minion
extends Card
    The complete description of a Minion Card.
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Martin Ars Alexis Claveau Alexis Loret Maud Van Dorssen

    • Constructor Detail

      • Minion

        Minion(int id,
       java.lang.String type,
       java.lang.String name,
       int manaCost,
       int damage,
       java.lang.String target,
       java.lang.String description,
       int healthPoints,
       boolean taunt,
       boolean lifeSteal,
       boolean charge,
       int attackBuff)
        Initialize the attributes of this class.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the card
        type - There are five types : common, mage, paladin, warrior and invocation
        name - the name of the card
        manaCost - the amount of mana that the card costs
        damage - the amount of damage that the card can inflict
        target - a simple text with the target of the card
        description - the description of the card
        attackBuff - the amount of the attack buff that the card can give
        taunt - if the card is taunting or not
        lifeSteal - if the can can steal life or not
        charge - if the card can charge or not
        healthPoints - the amount of health points the minion has
